trans-unit.source: Specifies access rights to a memory-mapped file that is not associated with a file on disk.
trans-unit.target: 指定与磁盘上的文件不相关联的内存映射文件的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: You can specify access rights when you use the <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.OpenExisting%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to open an existing memory-mapped file.
trans-unit.target: 使用时，可以指定访问权限<xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.OpenExisting%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法打开一个现有内存映射文件。

trans-unit.source: The right to get or set permissions on a file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文件权限的权限。

trans-unit.source: The right to change the security and audit rules associated with a file.
trans-unit.target: 更改与文件关联的安全和审核规则的权限。

trans-unit.source: The right to read and write to a file with the restriction that write operations will not be seen by other processes.
trans-unit.target: 读取和写入文件的权限，其限制条件是其他进程不会看到写入操作。

trans-unit.source: The right to delete a file.
The right to run an application file.
trans-unit.target: 运行应用程序文件的权限。

trans-unit.source: The right to exert full control over a file, and to modify access control and audit rules.
trans-unit.target: 对文件进行完全控制，以及修改访问控制和审核规则的权限。

trans-unit.source: This value represents the right to do anything with a file and is the combination of all rights in this enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 此值表示允许对文件进行任何操作的权限，并且它是此枚举中的所有权限的组合。

trans-unit.source: The right to open and copy a file as read-only.
trans-unit.target: 以只读方式打开和复制文件的权限。

trans-unit.source: The right to open and copy a folder or file as read-only, and to run application files.
trans-unit.target: 以只读方式打开和复制文件夹或文件的权限，以及运行应用程序文件的权限。

trans-unit.source: This right includes the <see cref="F:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileRights.Read" /> right and the <see cref="F:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileRights.Execute" /> right.
trans-unit.target: 此权限包括 <see cref="F:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileRights.Read" /> 权限和 <see cref="F:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileRights.Execute" /> 权限。

trans-unit.source: The right to open and copy access and audit rules from a file.
trans-unit.target: 从文件中打开并复制访问和审核规则的权限。

trans-unit.source: This does not include the right to read data, file system attributes, or extended file system attributes.
trans-unit.target: 这不包括读取数据、文件系统属性或扩展文件系统属性的权限。

trans-unit.source: The right to open and copy a file, and the right to add data to a file or remove data from a file.
trans-unit.target: 打开和复制文件的权限，以及向文件添加数据或从文件中移除数据的权限。

trans-unit.source: The right to open and copy a file, the right to add data to a file or remove data from a file, and the right to run an application file.
trans-unit.target: 打开和复制文件的权限、向文件添加数据或从文件中移除数据的权限，以及运行应用程序文件的权限。

trans-unit.source: The right to change the owner of a file.
trans-unit.target: 更改文件所有者的权限。

trans-unit.source: The right to add data to a file or remove data from a file.
trans-unit.target: 向文件添加数据或从文件中移除数据的权限。
